welcome_message_title: Welcome to Zawyat Sidi al Mekki
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zawyat Sidi al Mekki, Morocco! Known for its charming atmosphere and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mohamed V Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anfa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Anfa Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
